channel.title: Engineering on μβ
channel.description: Recent content in Engineering on μβ

item.title: Bringing data science to engineers
item.description: The goal of this article is to present couple challenges waiting the industrial data scientist or industrial data science teams, the deep reasons I believe are the root of this inertia, based on my experience (in both data science and engineering projects) and exchanges with engineers and data scientists. The last part introduces some suggestions to make the collaboration richer for both sides. Why isn’t data science already everywhere in engineering?
